Package com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConfigurationEventFilter
    Instances of this interface are used to filter configuration events to determine whether they should be delivered to registered listeners.
    IConfigurationEventListener
    An interface for handlers of ConfigurationEvent.
    IConfigurationEventSource
    Interface for objects that are sources of configuration events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AncestorOrSelfConfigurationEventFilter
    IConfigurationEventFilter implementation that enables all configuration events whose source is either the configuration object with the given name or one of its descendants.
    BooleanFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that a boolean flag of a configuration object has changed.
    ConfigurationAttributeChangedEvent  
    ConfigurationBaselineEvent  
    ConfigurationChangedWithEncryptionEvent
    This event if used when any of the configuration attribute has changed and the configuration file should be rewritten.
    ConfigurationEvent
    Base class for configuration events.
    ConfigurationEventPublisher
    This class acts as both an IConfigurationEventSource and an IConfigurationEventListener.
    ConfigurationRegisteredEvent
    An event which will be fired when a new object is registered.
    ConfigurationReloadEvent
    An event which is fired when the configuration is loaded or reloaded.
    ConfigurationReloadPostEvent
    An event which is fired after the configuration is loaded or reloaded.
    ConfigurationUnRegisteredEvent
    An event which will be fired when when an object is unregistered.
    HasModifiedRelativesFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the hasModifiedRelatives flag of a configuration object has changed.
    HasNonRefreshedChangesFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the hasNonRefreshedChanges flag of a configuration object has changed.
    HasNonRefreshedRelativesFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the hasNonRefreshedDescendants flag of a configuration object has changed.
    HasOutstandingChangesFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the hasOutstandingChanges flag of a configuration object has changed.
    LoadedFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the loaded flag of a configuration object has changed.
    MarkedForDeleteFlagChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the markedForaDelete flag of a configuration object has changed.
    OrderingChangedEvent
    Instances of this event class are used to notify that the ordering of the children of a configurable object has changed.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigurationEventType
    Enumeration for possible event types which can be fired by the configuration module.
